42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Sa’d said :The Prophet (May peace be upon him) distributed (spoils) among the people I said to him : Give so and so for he is a believer. He said : Or he is a Muslim. I give a man something while another man is dearer to me than him, fearing that he may fall into Hell on his face

chapter.ara-name: باب الدَّلِيلِ عَلَى زِيَادَةِ الإِيمَانِ وَنُقْصَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Proof Of Increase And Decrease Of Faith
